channel.title: Triforce Village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Triforce Village" - For all you LoZ lovers out there :) (everyone else welcome too!)

item.title: Re: Triforce Village
item.content:encoded:
Begging for villagers on a forum is not the best technique to place yourself well in this Ninja World. Some people make fun at targeting begging villagers in the future.

Nonetheless, good luck on your quest and future progression.

item.title: Triforce Village
item.content:encoded: Hi, anyone want to join Triforce village? Now that collecting doesn't take up stamina please help us out!
